keyMoments.title: Sanji Sees Through Jabra's Deception
keyMoments.description: Sanji quickly realizes that Jabra's fabricated story about being Robin's brother is a lie and declares he will kick him twice as hard for the deception.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's intelligence and perceptiveness in battle, showing he won't be fooled even by stories involving women.
keyMoments.quote: I'll kick you twice as hard for that lie!

keyMoments.title: Diable Jambe Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji unveils his revolutionary new technique, Diable Jambe, by spinning at high speed to set his leg ablaze, allowing him to pierce through Tekkai defenses.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a major power-up for Sanji and introduces one of his signature techniques that defines his fighting style for the rest of the series.

keyMoments.title: Diable Jambe: Premier Hachis
keyMoments.description: Sanji performs his first named Diable Jambe attack, delivering rapid dual-leg kicks enhanced by flames to break through Jabra's Tekkai.
keyMoments.significance: First practical application of Diable Jambe in combat, proving its effectiveness.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Jabra with Flambage Shot
keyMoments.description: Sanji delivers the finishing blow with Diable Jambe: Flambage Shot, a devastating flaming kick that defeats Jabra and secures his key.
keyMoments.significance: Sanji's victory over CP9's third-strongest member demonstrates his growth and advances the mission to rescue Robin.

abilities.description: Sanji spins at high speed to generate friction that sets his leg ablaze, adding devastating heat to his kicks that can pierce through powerful defenses like Tekkai.
A running jump attack with rapid dual-leg kicks enhanced by Diable Jambe's flames, targeting the opponent's stomach.
A powerful aerial side kick enhanced by Diable Jambe's flames, delivering explosive force. Used as the finishing move against Jabra.

reveals.information: Sanji can set his leg on fire using Diable Jambe technique

keyMoments.title: Jabra's Deceptive Story
keyMoments.description: Jabra attempts to deceive Sanji by claiming Robin is his long-lost sister and fabricating an elaborate backstory from the West Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jabra's cunning and willingness to use any tactic to gain an advantage in battle.

keyMoments.title: Gekko Jusshigan Attack
keyMoments.description: Jabra uses his Gekko Jusshigan (Moonlight Ten Finger Pistol), combining Geppo and Shigan in a powerful aerial piercing attack that successfully hits Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jabra's mastery of advanced Rokushiki techniques and his ability to land hits even on powerful opponents.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Diable Jambe
keyMoments.description: Despite his Tekkai Kenpo and powerful attacks, Jabra is defeated by Sanji's Diable Jambe: Flambage Shot, suffering broken ribs and burns to the bone.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Jabra's defeat and the successful completion of one of the key CP9 battles in the Enies Lobby rescue mission.

abilities.description: A unique fighting style that allows Jabra to move while using Tekkai, combining the iron body defense with offensive techniques.
Moonlight Ten Finger Pistol - A technique combining Geppo (aerial movement) and Shigan (piercing strikes) into a powerful plunging attack.
A powerful attack utilizing his wolf transformation's enhanced strength.

reveals.information: Jabra has a Doriki of 2180, making him CP9's third-strongest member
